mean_cn: adj.报复性的，怀恨的，惩罚的
mean_en: having or showing a desire to hurt someone who has hurt or caused problems for you
sentence: The vindictive little boy intentionally disrupted his brother\u0027s study time.
sentence_trans: 那个充满报复心的小男孩故意打扰他哥哥做作业。
word_etyma: vin力量 ＋ dict说 ＋ ive形容词后缀 → vindictive有报复心的
